name: Taylor Swiftidore
description:
Come January 7th, this extension will be deprecated. Isidore has undergone a complete rewrite, and as a result, this extension will not work. Do not install this extension. If you are running this extension, you should disable and delete it.
Taylor Swift CSS overlay for Isidore.

The extension was designed to work for Chrome. Firefox, Opera, and IE will run the extension, however there are a couple of issues.
Check for updates periodically.
additional_info:
Taylor Swiftidore 1.0.2


-Coloring for additional courses corrected

Email comments, questions, and bugs to swiftidore@gmail.com.
When reporting a bug, please tell what browser you're running and your operating system.
